Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller.Server

Class ConnectionController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller.Server.ServerController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller.Server.ConnectionController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerInterface, ServerControllerInterface
public class ConnectionController extends ServerController
The ConnectionController class extends the ServerController and manages the initial connection state of players, handling operations like setting nicknames, creating lobbies, and joining lobbies.

This class ensures synchronization and state management for players connecting to the server.

      public void setNickname(NetworkSession sender, String nickname)

    • createLobby

      public void createLobby(NetworkSession sender, int maxPlayers)
      Creates a new lobby with the specified maximum number of players. If the number of players is out of the valid range, an exception is thrown.
      Specified by:

      Overrides:

      Parameters:

    • joinLobby

      public void joinLobby(NetworkSession sender, UUID lobbyUUID)
      Adds a player to an existing lobby identified by the given UUID. If the lobby is full or does not exist, an exception is thrown.
      Specified by:
      joinLobby in interface ServerControllerInterface
      Overrides:
      joinLobby in class ServerController
      Parameters:
      sender - the network session of the client
      lobbyUUID - the UUID of the lobby to join
